p: Statistics also showed that the market expansion for the domestic pharmaceutical industry was about 10% while it was 40% for the international pharmaceutical companies, mostly due to the patented drugs. Patented drugs usually are a dozen times more expensive than the generic drugs. Patented drugs only comprise about 5% of all drug usage in China, but make up over 20% of sales of the total drug market. To promote universal medical coverage, generic drugs are invariably a better choice for China and other developing countries.
